block.p: BARRETT-Ernest (Gunny). Died suddenly August 27. Beloved husband of Sara, adored father of Debbie Barrett, Jo and Bruce Grellong. Cherished grandfather of Paul. Loving brother of William, brother-in-law of Rita Feldman, uncle and great uncle of many nieces and nephews. We love you and will miss you forever. Services Thursday, August 31, 2000, 1 PM at ''The Riverside,'' 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
